question: The famous cultural event ‘Kalidasa Samaroh’ is organised at which place of Madhya Pradesh?
explanation: Padma Bhusana awardee Late Pt. Surya Narayan Vyas, who was inspired by kalidas works, started organizing Kalidasa Jayanti in Ujjain in the thirties.Later, first kalidasa Samaroh at Ujjain was inaugurated by late of India’s First President Dr. Rajendra Prasad and the occasion turned out to be an important in the cultural history of India.Started on a grand scale in 1958, Kalidasa Samaroha is being celebrated every year at Ujjain. Year after year Ujjain has attracted the best known artists in the field of dramatics and dance performances.
